title: Japan woos overseas tourists to boost up its tourism sectorTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Japan woos overseas tourists to boost up its tourism sector Published on : Thursday, July 9, 2015
Japan is promoting its popular tourist destinations to attract foreign visitors. Recently In a `Visit Japan Asia Travel Mart 2015, an expo organized by the Japan National Tourism Organisation, many Japanese private and public sector representatives interacted with the travel agencies from Asia.
Japan has also been promoting Ise-Shima, the home to Japan’s most sacred Shinto shrines, the region is popular for its seafood, where G7 Summit Conference will be held in 2016. Asian Travel agencies find Japan an attractive tourist destination. Gifu was famous for its old ancient houses, and was a perfect time to visit in winter.
The houses appear differently during summer and winter. Many Indian travel agencies also took part in the expo and find Japan as attractive place for tourists. They also expect Japanese tourists visit India. To draw tourists, Japan is also attracting manufacturers from Asia to adopt their technology.
Recently in a Manufacturing World Japan Expo, huge number of companies participated to find and adopt new technologies. NEC displayed its 3D Virtual Reality Simulation at the event. The special glasses enable users to see 3D Virtual Reality. It will help them to fix certain manufacturing lines including the space, height and much more. Japan is aggressively contributing by introducing newer technologies to increase global production
